resources.string: today and still be on schedule.
The remaining balance cannot be greater than the initial balance
Today is not in the date range and some calculations may be off
The end date must be after the start date plus the days off
The total days off must be entered with the past days off
The past days off cannot be more than the total days off
The remaining balance must be entered
The values are not being saved
• The pawprint button opens Tigerbucks (may need a refresh to load content)\n• The \'e\' button opens eServices

• Rollover: How much you are rolling over from a previous semester
• Remaining balance: How much you have now
• Click on the meal plan and term drop-downs to change them
• Click on the dates to change them
• Total days off: The total number of days off in the date range
• Past days off: The number of days off that have already past
• Average: Average amount you can spend based on starting dining dollars\n• Currently: Average amount you can spend based on current dining dollars\n• Difference: Currently - Average
RIT Dining Planner by Ben Alderfer
This app is open source. You can find it here: https://github.com/BenAlderfer/RIT-Dining-Planner-Android

If you would like to translate this app, please email benalderfer974@gmail.com with your request and I will send you instructions.\n\nIf you already know how to do this, you can edit the strings.xml (\\app\\src\\main\\res\\values) file in the source and send it to the above email.

If you have any questions, bug reports, or suggestions, contact: benalderfer974@gmail.com

Please include your device and version of Android with any bug reports.

If you run into an error while using the app, please tap "Report" to send the error message to me.
